revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Moor of Icirrus |image = [[File:Moor of Icirrus.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Moor of Icirrus. |tokens = 356,500 |location = Unova Route 8 }} '''Moor of Icirrus''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 5,203,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Croagunk.png|40px]] Croagunk || [[File:Pokémon_Ranger_(female).png|40px]] Pokémon Ranger Elaine || [[File:Accelgor.png|40px]] Accelgor, [[File:Swalot.png|40px]] Swalot, [[File:Kecleon.png|40px]] Kecleon |- | [[File:Palpitoad.png|40px]] Palpitoad || [[File:Pokémon_Ranger_(male).png|40px]] Pokémon Ranger Parker || [[File:Escavalier.png|40px]] Escavalier, [[File:Skuntank.png|40px]] Skuntank, [[File:Carnivine.png|40px]] Carnivine |- | [[File:Karrablast.png|40px]] Karrablast || rowspan=2|[[File:Fisherman.png|40px]] Fisherman Eustace || rowspan=2|[[File:Corphish.png|40px]] Corphish, [[File:Poliwag.png|40px]] Poliwag, [[File:Stunfisk.png|40px]] Stunfisk |- | [[File:Shelmet.png|40px]] Shelmet |- | [[File:Stunfisk.png|40px]] Stunfisk || rowspan=2|[[File:Fisherman.png|40px]] Fisherman Arnold || rowspan=2|[[File:Poliwhirl.png|40px]] Poliwhirl, [[File:Whiscash.png|40px]] Whiscash, [[File:Politoed.png|40px]] Politoed |- | [[File:Barboach.png|40px]] Barboach |}
